def main():
    N, M = map(int, input().split())
    X = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    total_moves = 0
    for i in range(1, M):
        moves_from_current_to_next = abs(X[i-1] - X[i])
        total_moves += moves_from_current_to_next - 1
    print(total_moves)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys


def min_moves(pieces, target_coordinates):
    target_coordinates.sort()
    moves_required = 0

    for i in range(len(target_coordinates)):
        moves_required += abs(pieces[i] - target_coordinates[i])

    return moves_required


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, m = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

    print(min_moves(x, x))

import sys


def min_moves(pieces, target_coordinates):
    target_coordinates.sort()
    moves_required = 0

    for i in range(len(target_coordinates)):
        moves_required += abs(pieces[i] - target_coordinates[i])

    return moves_required


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, m = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))[:n]

    print(min_moves(x, x))


def move(xs):
    mvs = 0
    for i in range(len(xs)):
        if i+1 < len(xs) and (xs[i+1] - xs[i]) > 1:
            mvs += 1

    return mvs

def main():
    N, M = map(int, input().split())
    X = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    total_moves = 0
    for i in range(1, M-1):
        moves_from_current_to_next = abs(X[i] - X[i+1])
        total_moves += moves_from_current_to_next
    print(total_moves)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys


def min_moves(pieces, target_coordinates):
    moves_required = 0

    for i in range(len(pieces)):
        moves_required += abs(target_coordinates[i] - pieces[i])

    return moves_required
    y = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    y.sort()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, m = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

    print(min_moves(x, y))
